events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department and assigned to our recruitment team.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be contacting you soon to discuss the next steps.
The initial screening interview went well, and your skills and experience match the requirements.
You have responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM, please prepare accordingly.
You completed the technical interview successfully and demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 2 PM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went very well, and you expressed a keen interest in joining our team.
We have formally extended an offer for the software engineer position, including compensation and benefits details.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and are eager to finalize the terms.
You formally accepted our offer to join as a software engineer, and we look forward to working with you.
Your onboarding process has started successfully, including setup of accounts and introductory meetings.
The hiring process is now officially closed. Welcome aboard, and we are excited about your future contributions.
